archimate:Requirement.name: TS.1.3.2b: b) messaging gateways (e.g. email and web proxy servers that scan network traffic and electronic messages in real time) to minimise malware reaching endpoint devices
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
